metadata.title: Qualigenix | End-to-End AR Follow Up Services
metadata.description: Boost your cash flow with end-to-end AR follow up services. Qualigenix helps you track, resolve, and get paid on every claim, faster.

serviceSection.featuresHeadline:
AR Follow-Up Services That
Maximize Recovery and Minimize Delays
serviceSection.featuresDescription: Our accounts receivable follow-up services simplify payer communication and speed up reimbursements. From tracking aged claims to closing payment gaps, we ensure your revenue stays in motion.

features.name: Predictive Claim Alerts
features.description: Early warning signals trigger follow-ups for high-risk unpaid claims before they age out.

features.name: Escalation Workflow Trigger
features.description: Automatically escalates unresolved accounts to higher review levels for faster resolution.

features.name: Payment Promise Tracking
features.description: Track payer commitments and enforce timely payments to prevent revenue delays.

features.name: Denial & AR Routing
features.description: Combine dental and AR management to route issues to the right team promptly.

faqs.question: How does Qualigenix handle complex outstanding claims follow up?
faqs.answer: Our system uses AI-driven prioritization to identify complex claims. These are immediately routed to senior specialists who have the expertise to negotiate with payers, appeal denials, and resolve intricate billing issues, ensuring no claim is left unresolved.

faqs.question: What makes unpaid claim resolution faster with Qualigenix?
faqs.answer: We accelerate resolution through automated status checks, denial categorization, and by triggering immediate follow-ups. Our process eliminates manual work, allowing our team to focus only on the claims that require human intervention.

faqs.question: How do AR performance metrics healthcare improve collections?
faqs.answer: Our live dashboards provide 24/7 transparency. You can track key metrics like Days in A/R, first-pass resolution rate, and denial rates. This data helps identify bottlenecks in your revenue cycle, allowing for targeted improvements that directly boost collections.

faqs.question: Can your A/R follow-up process adapt to different specialties?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our platform is system-agnostic and our teams are trained in a wide range of specialties, from Cardiology to Behavioral Health. We customize our follow-up workflows based on the specific rules and common denial reasons for each specialty.

faqs.question: How do you ensure transparency during A/R recovery?
faqs.answer: Transparency is central to our service. Clients have real-time access to performance dashboards and receive regular, detailed reports on all actions taken, recovery amounts, and the status of outstanding claims.

faqs.question: What long-term value do your A/R services provide?
faqs.answer: Beyond immediate cash flow improvement, we provide long-term value by identifying root causes of denials. We give you actionable feedback to improve your front-end processes (like registration and eligibility), reducing future denials and creating a healthier revenue cycle.
